name: Chaptered Nonfiction Starter
description: Outlines a clean, chapter-based structure for a nonfiction book, following Reedsy-style formatting and thematic coherence.
instructions: Create a complete outline for a nonfiction book. Use numbered chapters with titles, each with a 2â€“3 sentence summary. Focus on clarity, impact, and logical flow. Follow Reedsy formatting (no bold/italics/special characters).
